title: Lynda - Street Photography: Posed Portraiture
description:
Lynda - Street Photography: Posed Portraiture

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been post, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

1h 14m Intermediate Jul 10, 2015 | Uploaded in Dec 8, 2015 by 2boweb

Subject: Photography 
Author: Steve Simon 

Candid street photography is one thing; posed street photography is another. Approaching strangers and asking to photograph them isn't easy. But it's rewardingâ€”not only for your photography, but also for you. It all starts with breaking the ice, and in this course, Steve Simon takes to the streets of New York City to talk to strangers and take their pictures. By posing his subjects at various locations, he creates a portrait of the entire city: people at work, people at play, people in uniform, and people with their own unique style. Along the way, Steve shares the keys to successful posed street portraiture, from starting conversations with strangers to choosing the right gear and lenses.
Topics include:
	â€¢	Breaking the ice with subjects
	â€¢	Photographing people at work
	â€¢	Posing subjects in a city park
	â€¢	Photographing people on the move
	â€¢	Photographing people in suits and uniforms
